name: RIDICULOUS
description:
• TITLE: RIDICULOUS
  • GENRE: Text adventure, decision making
  • ENGINE: Twine
  • PEGI: +7
  • LANGUAGE: English
  • DESCRIPTION:

A short game about making a fool of oneself in English.

Short exercise made in 2 hours approximately during the TWINE masterclass of the Voxel School Masterclasses of 12/05/2018.

It was first time using TWINE, so don't expect much.

The topic for the exercise was the most ridiculious situation in your life.

The game is in Spanish but you also need a basic knowledge of English.

CONTROLS:

mouse: right click to select.
